title: African American soldiers in Civil War - treatment

content.question: Which of the following statements about African American soldiers during the Civil War is correct?

choices.label: They were primarily engaged in military campaigns west of the Mississippi.
They were limited to noncombat duty.
They were barred form receiving awards for valor in combat.
For most of the war, they were paid less than White soldiers of equal rank.
For most of the war, they were led by African American officers.

content.answer: For most of the war, they were paid less than White soldiers of equal rank.
